attributes.action: Make the unemployed work community service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are unemployed should work a day a week community service for their benefit. Obviously this would be consigned to those who are able to work. This will create a more honest society and tax payers will be getting worth their tax, with clean streets and so on, if they dont turn up to service, dont pay them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
